input.description: String Value - The name of a configuration item defined in a configuration module. Valid Values: BMC_AR_System, Service Desk, CiscoWorks LMS, Atrium CMDB.

String Value - Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully.
Valid values: success, failure
String Value - A process specific string that explains the value of success status.

documentation.description: This workflow will extract the configuration data for this module.
